root.name: String Concatenation

example.code: a = 'a' s = a * 3 # Multiplying a string by n duplicates the it n times. println(s) # Prints 'aaa'. s += 'b' + 'bb' # String concatenation with the plus sign. println(s) # Prints 'aaabbb'.

root.description: Concatenate strings with the attention operator +. Multiplying a string by an integer n duplicates the string n times.
root.related: string_formatting string_find string_strip string_join string_split string_replace
